description:
YOU NEED ACCESS TO AN INSTANCE OF TINY TINY RSS TO USE THIS APP!

TE-Reader is an app to read news feeds from a TinyTiny RSS instance on your device. Share interresting articles, mark them as read/unread, "publish" and "star" them. Or simply add new feeds to your server installation. Just copy the url to the clipboard and hit "Add feed". Share interesting articles via Twitter, APP.net or Facebook, or add them to ReadOnTouch

"Tiny Tiny RSS is an open source web-based news feed (RSS/Atom) aggregator, designed to allow you to read news from any location, while feeling as close to a real desktop application as possible." Get it from: http://tt-rss.org

TE-Reader was developed by Marcel Meissel and Henk Jonas. It wouldn't have been possible without the contribution of Henk Jonas. Thanks Henk for your assistance and work!
copyright: Copyright 2013 Marcel Meissel and Henk Jonas
